author: rb:ez.no
msg: - Try to fix caching but got lots of PDO segfaults. Trying it on another installation.

author: as:ez.no
msg: - Fixed 2 tests failing because of whitespace issues.

author: as:ez.no
msg: - Added header folding for the Content-Disposition header.
- Fixed an issue with ezcMailHeaderFolder::foldAny() where notices were thrown
if the header contained a too long string without white spaces.

author: as:ez.no
msg: - Implemented feature request #9068: added support for filename language and
filename charset support for the Content-Disposition header.
